title: Download WorldClim Data
text: goal WorldClimData present faster way download WorldClim data using piggyback

title: Download WorldClim Data
text: can install development version WorldClimData GitHub :

title: Download WorldClim Data
text: Currently WorldClimData doesn’t WorldClim data. data current period following resolution: 10’ resolution: variables (“bio”,“elev”,“prec”,“srad”,“tavg”,“tmax”,“tmin”,“vapr”,“wind”) 5’ resolution: variables (“bio”,“elev”,“prec”,“srad”,“tavg”,“tmax”,“tmin”,“vapr”,“wind”) 2.5’ resolution: variables (“bio”,“elev”,“prec”,“srad”,“tavg”,“tmax”,“tmin”,“vapr”,“wind”) 30” resolution: “elev”, “wind”

title: Download WorldClim Data
text: download_worldclim function download zipped worldclim data WorldClim_data folder unzipped .tiff files WorldClim_data_unzipped folder inside working directory. folder name can specified within function using folder_path argument. example creates 2 folders (WorldClim_data WorldClim_data_unzipped) downloads data Elevation variable Current period 10’ resolution. folder structure presented .
code: library(WorldClimData) download_worldclim(period = "current",                    variable = "elev",                    resolution = 10,                    folder_path = "./WorldClim_data") #> i Downloading the following files #> worldclim_base_v21_current_elev_10m.zip #> i Files downloaded. Unzipping... #> v Done Working directory ├── WorldClim_data │   └── worldclim_base_v21_current_elev_10m.zip └── WorldClim_data_unzipped     └── wc2.1_10m_elev.tif

what: Download WorldClim v.2.1 bioclimatic data — download_worldclim
title: Download WorldClim v.2.1 bioclimatic data — download_worldclim
text: function allows download data WorldClim v.2.1 (https://www.worldclim.org/data/index.html) considering multiple GCMs, time periods SSPs.

title: Download WorldClim v.2.1 bioclimatic data — download_worldclim
code: download_worldclim(period = 'current', variable = 'bio', year = '2030', gcm = 'mi', ssp = '126', resolution = 10)

title: Download WorldClim v.2.1 bioclimatic data — download_worldclim
text: period Can 'current' 'future'. variable Allows specify variables want retrieve Possible entries : 'tmax','tmin','prec' /'bioc'. resolution can select one resolution following alternatives: 10, 5, 2.5 30. year Specify year want retrieve data. Possible entries : '2030', '2050', '2070' /'2090'. can  use vector provide one entry. gcm GCMs considered future scenarios. can use vector provide one entry. ssp SSPs future data. Possible entries : '126', '245', '370' /'585'. can use vector provide one entry.

title: Download WorldClim v.2.1 bioclimatic data — download_worldclim
text: function create folder entitled 'WorldClim_data'. data downloaded stored folder. Note , despite possible retrieve lot data , recommended , since data heavy.

title: Download WorldClim v.2.1 bioclimatic data — download_worldclim
